Container.Name: apple-docs-mcp
Container.Overview: Apple Developer Documentation MCP Server - Provides AI-powered search across 323,096 Apple developer documentation pages with platform-aware filtering. Features automatic weekly updates, sub-500ms search performance, and MCP (Model Context Protocol) integration for AI assistants like Claude.
Container.DonateText: If you find this useful, consider starring the GitHub repo!
Container.Description: Apple Developer Documentation MCP Server provides comprehensive search capabilities across all Apple frameworks and platforms (iOS, macOS, tvOS, watchOS, visionOS). Perfect for developers who need offline access to Apple's documentation with AI-powered search.

Config.Name: MCP Server Port
Config.Description: Port for MCP server API endpoint

Config.Name: Hash Storage
Config.Description: ETags and content hashes for incremental updates

Config.Name: Logs Directory
Config.Description: Container logs for MCP server and scheduler

Config.Name: OpenAI API Key
Config.Description: OpenAI API key for text-embedding-3-small (required for embeddings generation)

Config.Name: MCP API Key
Config.Description: Bearer token for MCP authentication (generate with: openssl rand -hex 32)

Config.Name: Keep Markdown Files
Config.Description: Keep scraped markdown files after embedding (true = ~2GB extra disk usage)

Config.Name: Timezone
Config.Description: Timezone for scheduled updates (default: Sundays at 1 AM EST/EDT)
